page.title: 04NATIONAL TRUST FOOTPATH
page.content: Part of the National Trust coastal footpath goes through our square . the 12, 13th tees of the Churston Golf Club are in our square together with the cricket ground the Brixham Cricket Club uses. Part of the now dismantled south Devon railway built by I. K. Brunel, also is in this square. Fishcombe Cove has many chalets for rent. There are 3 metal manufacturing businesses situated near the Nouthfields Road which dominates the square. 36% of the square is residential, 27% rough woodland 30% farmland,the golf couse was 6% and the sea 1%.
